post.body: happy 700th! what a waste... lol :D
I meant a picture. Haha. Like make it HUGE.
it's okay, I can blow up a cardboard cut out of hugo's face and wear it if you like?
bestiality is your passion, I knew it. Hugo tells me to tell you he's flattered but you're not really his type...
gave in and is reading the lul fest that is twilight. ohmigosh it's bad.
my open learning is fucked man... oops. off to a christmas parade now. ciao.
"who's the bitterest man in the living room? the bitterest man in the living room... hi neighbor!"
dance was amazing. after party was better. little drunk so im going to sleep now. i love my friends so much, you are fabulous!
off to get ready for the dance!
WELLLLL EXCITED for tomorrow night!
my dinosaur is starting to hatch...
oh my! http://news.bbc.co.uk/1/hi/entertainment/7786171.stm if people start liking my boy to be cool or "hip", i will exterminate them.
just generally angry...
p.s - andy, you twitter too much dude. i can't understand you.
holy fucking boredom batman!
ALSO whoever the fuck added me on bebo pretending to be lauren, you are a sick motherfucker and i will beat your ass if i ever find you.
by the way, the x factor version of hallelujah is fucking awful. just because someone can sing doesn't mean they feel the emotion.
had a good day. half days rule. dying hair in an hour...
is going to school... back at one thirty. cutting rules haha.
Gary Oldman got married? ARE YOU KIDDING ME? Okay, I'm going to die alone.
just got a phonecall from megan very upset about how jeff died. i love my friends & i miss jeff so much. back to school tomorrow.
twilight was full of LOL! "you are my personal brand of heroin". Haha! so awful is was good, in a way. hope my car is fixable for tomorrow.
my poor car...
i feel for the kids who look up to jonas brothers/miley. they have no idea what music is. awful, just plain awful. never sing a-ha again :|
i stayed up until 5 am watching ben dry the dishes and get ready for bed. is that sad?
i wish heath ledger was still here. i still feel so awful for his daughter. can't believe it's nearly been a year...
oh rob, i apologise for last night but you can't do that. also, wtf at that mother?!
aww how lovely is ben adams?
just heard about john travolta's son. i really wish it was a rumour. my thoughts are with him and his family just now.
my douchebag of the year is my geography teacher. who's yours?
haha sorry i had to rant somewhere people actually read.rpattz cant do that.twilight teenies will love jeff and i will kill them. happy 2009
honestly. if robert is cast as jeff i will flip. franco is fucking amazing and plus he actually looks like jeff so robert gtfo the planet.
robert pattinson needs to stfu about playing jeff. fuck you. of course franco will get it. just saw him in james dean and he can do anything
holy shit i am drink. what a fabulous nightt! i love emma and sam, they are my bestest buddies... happy new yyear to all of you!!!!
james morrison singing sex on fire is worth a listen. good riddance to 2008! hope you all have a great new year - see you in 2009.
